description: This dashboard helps to track Aerospike transaction metrics, including success rates, errors, and rollbacks.

panels.description: Displays the total success rate of MRT roll forward, roll back, monitor roll forward, monitor roll back, and verify read.
panels.title: Success (total) (rate)

panels.description: Displays the total error and timout rate of MRT roll forward, roll back, monitor roll forward, monitor roll back, and verify read.
panels.title: Error/Timeout - (total) (rate)

panels.description: Displays the total number of transactions currently being driven by a monitor.
panels.title: Monitors Active (total)

panels.description: Displays the total number of provisional records.
panels.title: Provisionals (total)

panels.description: Device storage used by this set in bytes, for the data part (does not include index part).
panels.title: Data Used (bytes)

panels.description: Total number of objects (master and all replicas) in this set on this node.
panels.title: Objects (Ongoing MRTs)

panels.description: Total number of tombstones (master and all replicas) in this set on this node.
panels.title: Tombstones (total)

panels.description: More details about [stop writes size](https://docs.aerospike.com/reference/configuration#stop-writes-size).

targets.expr: count_values("stop_write_size", aerospike_sets_stop_writes_size{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster|$^", ns=~"$namespace", set=~"<ERO~MRT",} or on() vector(-1))

panels.title: Stop Writes Size (Unique values)

panels.description: More details about [stop writes count](https://docs.aerospike.com/reference/configuration#stop-writes-count).
panels.title: Stop Writes Count (Unique values)

panels.description: Device storage used by this set in bytes, for the data part (does not include index part).
panels.title: Data Used (bytes)

panels.description: Total number of objects (master and all replicas) in this set on this node.
panels.title: Objects (Ongoing MRTs)

panels.description: Displays the success rate of MRT roll forward, roll back, monitor roll forward, monitor roll back, and verify read.
panels.title: Success (total) (rate)

panels.description: Displays the error and timout rate of MRT roll forward, roll back, monitor roll forward, monitor roll back, and verify read.

targets.expr:
sum(
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_roll_forward_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_roll_back_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_verify_read_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_monitor_roll_forward_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_monitor_roll_back_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
)

sum(
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_roll_forward_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_roll_back_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_verify_read_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_monitor_roll_forward_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
+
    rate(aerospike_namespace_mrt_monitor_roll_back_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])
)

panels.title: Error/Timeout (rate)

panels.description: Displays the number of transactions currently being driven by a monitor.
panels.title: Monitors Active (total)

panels.description: Displays the number of provisional records.
panels.title: Provisionals (total)

panels.description: Number of roll forward transactions that succeeded,failed and timeout.
panels.title: Commit (total) (rate)

panels.description: Number of roll back transactions that succeeded,failed and timed out.
panels.title: Rollback (total) (rate)

panels.description: Subset of mrt_roll_forward_success,error and timeout where the monitor did the roll forward.
panels.title: Monitor Commit (total) (rate)

panels.description: Subset of mrt_roll_back_success,error and timeout where the monitor did the rollback.
panels.title: Monitor Rollback (total) (rate)

panels.description: Number of verify read transactions that succeeded,failed and timed out.
panels.title: Verify Read (total) (rate)

panels.description: Displays the total error and timout rate of MRT roll forward, roll back, monitor roll forward, monitor roll back, and verify read.
panels.title: Error (total) (rate)

panels.description: Displays the total error and timout rate of MRT roll forward, roll back, monitor roll forward, monitor roll back, and verify read.
panels.title: Timeout (total) (rate)

panels.description: Number of transactions or read/write commands blocked or mismatches by an ongoing transaction
panels.title: Blocked / Mistmatch (total) (rate)

panels.description: Number of transactions currently being driven by a monitor.
panels.title: Monitors Active

panels.description: Number of times monitor rolls (forward or back) generate tombstones from nothing.
panels.title: Monitor Tombstone Creates (total) (rate)

panels.description: Number of provisional records.
panels.title: Provisionals

title: MRT View
